item.description: The sign-ups start at 6:30 and the show starts at 7:00. Come early if you'd like to grab some food and chat about songwriting. The cost at the door is $5.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be sitting in the back of the room on the side with the windows.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Club Passim Open Mic
